creditline: Gift of the Joseph F. McCrindle Collection
description: fifteen small sketches on one sheet:  arches, staircases, pillars and streets--most contain human figures; sketch in UR corner resembles landscape more than architecture
medium: Pen and brown ink and wash over graphite
provenance: Joseph F. McCrindle (until d. 2008); Joseph F. McCrindle Foundation (2008-2009; gave to MIA)
title: Fifteen Miniature Architectural and Italian Views
